Color Matcher
  • Color-Matcher
  • color_match module
  • View page source

color_match module

Matches input RGB values to closest color in the stored database.

color_match.blit_closest_color(in_color)

Blits rectangle with closest match color

color_match.blit_current_color(in_color)

Blits rectangle with input color

color_match.color_match_by_hex(input_color, df)

Finds the closest color by comparing absolute hex values.

color_match.color_match_by_rgb(input_color, df)

Finds the closest color by comparing avg of RGB difference.

color_match.event_handler(color_num, in_color_code, df)

For handling quit, key_left, key_right.

color_match.hex_to_int(raw)

Converts hexadecimal number to integer

color_match.hex_to_rgb(raw)

Convert hex code to RGB values for 8-bit color

color_match.random_colors(num_colors)

Returns a list of random colors of size num_colors

color_match.rgb_to_int(in_color)

Converts RGB -> hex -> integer.
